      Methods in learning.supervised.evaluation with parameters of type ClassificationEstimator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ClassificationEstimator.appendMainPointsStDevsToFile(ClassificationEstimator[] estimators, java.io.File outFile)
      This method prints the stDevs of the main stats in the array of classification estimators to a file, which is usually done when persisting the average results of cross-validation.
      static void ClassificationEstimator.printMainPointsOfEstimatorsToFile(ClassificationEstimator[] estimators, java.io.File outFile)
      This method persists the main stats of an array of estimators to a file.
